name: Stone Guardian
description: The Stone Guardian is a formidable large construct, notable for its colossal size and stone-like exterior, which grants it exceptional physical defenses.
memorable: Its ability to resist magic and its immutable form make it a near-unstoppable force in battle.
goals: To serve and protect a designated area or master, engaging in combat to eliminate threats.
relations: Often found guarding ruins, temples, or serving as sentinels for powerful wizards.
environment: Typically found in ancient ruins, magical locations, or sites of significance.
strengths: High damage output with its melee attacks and resistance to spells.
weaknesses: Low Dexterity and social skills limit its effectiveness in agile situations or negotiations.
attacks: Can execute powerful melee slam attacks and ranged rock throws, dealing substantial bludgeoning damage.
most_powerful_ability: The Slow ability can significantly restrict multiple opponents' actions, adding tactical control to its arsenal.
senses: The Stone Guardian has darkvision up to 120 feet.
additional_information: Magic resistance grants advantage on spell saves.
Immutable form makes it immune to physical alterations.
Does not require air, food, or sleep due to Constructed Nature.
Can perform multiple attacks per turn.
Targeted slowing ability can affect multiple creatures at once.
test_queries: stone creature with high damage output
